attributes.action: ensure building regulations are practical and can be adhered to by the householder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Building regulations require some energy efficient lightbulbs to be fitted in new houses. It is extremely difficult to find shades which will fit these fitments.  The usual circumference is too small, therefore lots of new owners are replacing the low energy fittings with ordinary bulbs and holders - then their shades will fit.
